Name: Port Wine Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Port and brandy served straight-up and dressed up.
History: A classic from the early 1900s. A recipe for a "Port Wine Cocktail" appears in Frank Newman's 1900 French book American-Bar Recettes des Boissons Anglaises & Américaines .
Nutrition: One serving of Port Wine Cocktail contains 203 calories
